fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: **For every card you draw, you may choose to flip it or keep it unflipped.**

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:enchantment:1107516323426213888> + <:pink:1106716301843497030> + <:magenta:1106716255966220319> + <:orange:1106716206905438231> + <:cyan:1106716163184009277> ):
fields.value: **All flipped cards you play have their effects doubled. One random card in your hand (that can be flipped) is flipped every turn.**
